Metadata: Luffariellolide​, an anti-​inflammatory sesterterpene from the marine sponge "Luffariella" sp

Luffariellolide is a sesterterpene from the Palauan sponge "Luffariella" sp. that has useful anti-​inflammatory properties. In contrast with the irreversible action of manoalide on purified bee venom phospholipase A2, luffariellolide is a slightly less potent but partially reversible PLA2 inhibitor.
